sourcesContent:
import React, { useCallback, useEffect, useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import {
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    SimpleGrid,
    VStack,
    Input,
    FormHelperText,
} from '@chakra-ui/react';


export default function Form() {
    return (
        <SimpleGrid columns={1} spacing={10} bg="whiteAlpha.100" m="120px">
            <VStack spacing={8} borderRadius={10} borderWidth={2} p={10} bg="#F4F2F2" color="grey">
                <VStack>
                    <FormControl >
                        <FormLabel color="#6D5D5D">Email address</FormLabel>
                        <Input type='email' borderColor="#B8B5B5" color="black" borderWidth={3} />
                        <FormHelperText>We'll never share your email.</FormHelperText>
                    </FormControl>
                    <FormControl>
                        <FormLabel color="#6D5D5D">Email address</FormLabel>
                        <Input type='email' borderColor="#B8B5B5" color="black" borderWidth={3} />
                        <FormHelperText>We'll never share your email.</FormHelperText>
                </FormControl>
                </VStack>
            </VStack>
        </SimpleGrid>
    )
}
